name: Destinationoftheday
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Each day destination of the day will bring you a new vacation/travel idea every single day of the week, read by an actual person. Unique vacation ideas along with tips for the best time of the year to go, how long you should plan for, what you should know when planning, and an insider travel tip. The best part is that you can get a new idea in the time it takes you to drink your morning coffee or brush your teeth.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
